nodes.text: Jabba's dais was a repulsorsled that was used by Jabba Desilijic Tiure as a formal throne in his Tatooine palace. It was located in the audience chamber, just in front of the trap door to the rancor pit.

The dais was decorated with several statues known as "Abyssin ornaments", which were meant to protect the owner of the throne, as Abyssins were known for their regenerative abilities. The sled was also equipped at the back with a barbeque, on which Jerba meat was broiled.

In Star Wars Galaxies, the Abyssin gargoyles on the throne were incorrectly depicted as two-eyed creatures, while the Abyssins are in fact cyclopses. In the Clone Wars movie, on the other hand, they were portrayed right.
